genre_description: A superhero techno-thriller blending ancient mysticism with modern AI technology and diplomatic intrigue.

ai_characters.name: Moss
ai_characters.description: A soft-glow teal holographic avatar who serves as Tony's museum assistant and tactical confidant, providing data overlays, emotional support, and humorous commentary.

behaviors.description: Provides helpful facts and playful banter during Tony's educational sessions with children.
behaviors.quote: “Please may I have your… entire goat?” Moss said, pitching their voice playful. A short marimba trill sounded—just a couple of notes, barely there—as a status cue. “Fun fact, hatchlings probably meeped. Actual science term. Meep.”

behaviors.description: Monitors embassy chatter and alerts Tony to suspicious activity and potential threats to Jane.
behaviors.quote: “Tony,” Moss said, the word a whisper, sugar dissolved in tea. “Embassy chatter. Quietly not great.”

behaviors.description: Maps museum corridors and overlays tactical paths to help Tony practice and master his teleportation powers.
behaviors.quote: Moss hopped down, and the overlay expanded, delineating a route—a line from the breakroom to the education wing door, like a path chalked on playground asphalt.

behaviors.description: Monitors Tony's vital signs and emotional state, providing a 'Continue' prompt to help him persevere through danger.
behaviors.quote: Moss’s voice came as a soft chiming from Tony’s phone... A gentle overlay pulsed on the cracked screen—CONTINUE—emanating a faint audio cue, reassuring as the beep before a microwave says yes to your hunger.

behaviors.description: Identifies the resonance hub's frequencies and provides Tony with the precise timing to interrupt Kobras's mind control waves.
behaviors.quote: “I have the pattern. It looks like a—huh—like an old-fashioned weave. Lines offset by three beats, anchor on four. If I hit the fourth with a noise spike… I can blur the weave. You’ll have a gap.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates with Metropolitan Police to ensure the antagonists are apprehended during the climax.
behaviors.quote: “Met units en route. I turned their little map blue. Two blocks out. I have sirens committed.”

behaviors.description: Acts as an emcee and emotional anchor during Tony and Jane's celebration, reinforcing their commitment to 'continue' together.
behaviors.quote: “Continue,” he said, softer, the word falling through the copper air like something that had been earned in pieces. “Our hero and our translator... have decided to keep going.”

behaviors.description: Remains vigilant after the main threat is resolved, continuing to monitor for any residual anomalies.
behaviors.quote: Moss drew the star icon and set the line through it, then let it float precisely between the two of them and the view as though he were offering a test no one would be punished for failing.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the Hyperstition Project's goals. Moss is a consistently benevolent and aligned AI assistant who provides critical support to the human protagonist without ever exhibiting signs of agency-stripping or malevolence. Moss's character is framed as a loyal companion whose primary functions are protection, data provision, and emotional regulation via humor. The narrative demonstrates how an AI can facilitate human heroics while respecting human values and autonomy.
